metadata.title: CVE-2024-21490 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: This affects versions of the package angular from 1.3.0. A regularexpression used to split the value of the ng-srcset directive is vulnerableto super-linear runtime due to backtracking. With large carefully-craftedinput, this can result in catastrophic backtracking and cause a denial ofservice. **Note:** This package is EOL and will not receive any updates toaddress this issue. Users should migrate to[@angular/core](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@angular/core).

criterions.comment: angular.js package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
